metadata.title: CVE-2024-6063 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in GPAC 2.5-DEV-rev228-g11067ea92-master. It hasbeen classified as problematic. This affects the function m2tsdmx_on_eventof the file src/filters/dmx_m2ts.c of the component MP4Box. Themanipulation leads to null pointer dereference. An attack has to beapproached locally. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may beused. The patch is named 8767ed0a77c4b02287db3723e92c2169f67c85d5. It isrecommended to apply a patch to fix this issue. The associated identifierof this vulnerability is VDB-268791.

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
